note.p: Birth: Arnold, near Nottingham, Nottinghamshire, England (12 July 1807)
Death: His residence at 14 Phillimore Gardens, Kensington, London (23 September 1893)
Career: Articled to a surveyor and architect in Nottingham; went to London (1852); Engineer-in-chief to Sheffield (1864-1893) and to water supply works at Liverpool (1874-1885)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1894 vol 55 pp xvi-xvii signed by W P
